publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4207 Dr Elaine Murray: The Meteoric Rise of Gretna Football Club—That the Parliament congratulates Gretna Football Club on winning the Scottish League Second Division title and on its promotion to the First Division; notes that it is the first UK club this season to secure its league championship; notes that Gretna FC joined the Scottish Football League as recently as 2002 and that it secured the third division championship last season; commends the club on its community programme involving outreach work in schools in Dumfries and Galloway and Cumbria and a programme of events for young people, and wishes Gretna Football Club good luck in the First Division next year.

S2M-4207 Dr Elaine Murray: The Meteoric Rise of Gretna Football Club—That the Parliament congratulates Gretna Football Club on winning the Scottish League Second Division title and on its promotion to the First Division; notes that it is the first UK club this season to secure its league championship; notes that Gretna FC joined the Scottish Football League as recently as 2002 and that it secured the third division championship last season; commends the club on its community programme involving outreach work in schools in Dumfries and Galloway and Cumbria and a programme of events for young people, and wishes Gretna Football Club good luck in the First Division next year. Supported by: Murray Tosh, Nora Radcliffe, Bill Butler, Mrs Mary Mulligan, Chris Ballance, Trish Godman, Mr Jim Wallace, Michael McMahon, Mr Alasdair Morrison, Mr Frank McAveety, Des McNulty, Brian Adam, Tommy Sheridan, Ms Sandra White, Donald Gorrie, Mr Brian Monteith, Helen Eadie*, Karen Gillon*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*
S2M-4207 The Meteoric Rise of Gretna Football Club (lodged on 29 March 2006) Fiona Hyslop*
S2M-4207 The Meteoric Rise of Gretna Football Club (lodged on 29 March 2006) Robin Harper*
